pr_title: Make enum for CO install type

timeline.message:
Make enum for CO install type

Signed-off-by: kornys <kornys@outlook.com>

timeline.bodyText: I know this is something you didn't introduced. But any chance we can change here BUNDLE to something like YAML? I do not think bundle is really clear to what it means. Or is it more complicated then just changing the Enum? (e.g. some pipelines etc.)

replies.bodyText: Even if in different other repos I saw the YAMLs being referred as bundle. For example, installation of the prometheus-operator provides a bundle.yaml containing all the resources.

replies.bodyText: @ppatierno I do not think it is a wrong name per se. The problem is that it is ambiguous name. Lot of things are being referred to as bundle ... among others the OLM files are bundles as well. That is why this is so confusing.
